about_the_game:
Deezel Riggs' second car in the AcceleRacers series, the Piledriver™ takes its name from a ruthless wrestling move that leaves no opponents a chance: they are flipped and crushed to the ground. Likewise, Piledriver™ can turn any situation around and take out the competition on the track in an instant. An open-structure single-seater that reveals the engine and NO2 tanks for extra power.
Technetium™ is instead a beauty from Team Silencerz that needs no introduction. Actually, it would need it, but many of its characteristics remain a mystery, as per Silencerz tradition. The only thing that won't be a mystery is that it will take you straight to the podium!
Add AcceleRacers Free Pack 2 to your collection!

This DLC includes:
  • Piledriver™
  • Technetium™
detailed_description:
Deezel Riggs' second car in the AcceleRacers series, the Piledriver™ takes its name from a ruthless wrestling move that leaves no opponents a chance: they are flipped and crushed to the ground. Likewise, Piledriver™ can turn any situation around and take out the competition on the track in an instant. An open-structure single-seater that reveals the engine and NO2 tanks for extra power.
Technetium™ is instead a beauty from Team Silencerz that needs no introduction. Actually, it would need it, but many of its characteristics remain a mystery, as per Silencerz tradition. The only thing that won't be a mystery is that it will take you straight to the podium!

short_description: Piledriver™ takes its name from a wrestling move that leaves no opponents a chance. Technetium™, on the other hand, is a beauty shrouded in mystery. The only thing that won't be a mystery is that they will take you straight to the podium!
